content:
The passage of time itself is a huge tailwind for Bitcoin. Every year, the general pop, regardless of age is more inclined to owning and using BTC.

And, every year, currently younger demographics (whom are most inclined to BTC) comprise a larger share of the aggregate economy https://t.co/U5axA2ZONU

content: 10/ Lastly in the conviction phase – we gauge purchase propensity by asking participants how likely they are to buy Bitcoin in the next 5 years. At time of survey, Bitcoin was still ~50% below ATH. Still, we saw a surge in the general population’s propensity to purchase BTC. https://t.co/NQ2j1yjCh2

content: 9/ We also gauge the general population’s preference for Bitcoin relative to other assets by asking whether they would prefer $1k of BTC over $1k of other major assets. Preference rates for BTC were up across the board https://t.co/cGfCNYON55
renderedContent: 9/ We also gauge the general population’s preference for Bitcoin relative to other assets by asking whether they would prefer $1k of BTC over $1k of other major assets. Preference rates for BTC were up across the board https://t.co/cGfCNYON55

content: 8/ We added a new question to the 2020 survey asking whether participants expect Bitcoin or the euro to exist longer. I expected single digit % to select BTC. Instead, 38% of Americans indicated they expect Bitcoin to exist longer than the euro—including 58% of those aged 18-34. https://t.co/8fyhTaY70e
renderedContent: 8/ We added a new question to the 2020 survey asking whether participants expect Bitcoin or the euro to exist longer. I expected single digit % to select BTC. content: 7/ There was shockingly strong growth in the percentage of people that indicated “it’s likely that most people will be using Bitcoin in the next 10 years”—including 56% of those aged 18-34 (up 8 percentage points) and 57% of those aged 35-44 (up 19 percentage points) https://t.co/1CDcxog2B3

content:
The single 2020 prediction that raised the most eyebrows & triggered the most questions  was DeFi hitting $5B in TVL  -- which was hovering ~$600M at the time.

Really didn't expect we would get to $10B so quickly though - future comes at you fast!

cc @VCBrags hit me with it! 😜 https://t.co/UvlHqXkHee
